text: The 2001 Croatian Figure Skating Championships ( were the National Championships of the 2000–01 figure skating season. Skaters competed in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, and Ice dancing. ==Senior results== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Rank !
